pullrequest.title: Fix for bullet crashing when mesh shape files cannot be found.

content.raw:
Yeah I know this is a weird way to do it... using the `<insertion>` tag and adding the model via the world state is a bit of an unintuitive way to add a model, because `World::LoadModel` is unfortunately private.

It is also possible to use a world file. I've just done it this way to make sure the model loading was tested in one step of the test.

I've added a second test which uses the world file instead. The same issue happens and is fixed by this PR. Should we just keep that one and delete the first version?

‌
